title: Virtual Learning Instructional Design Strategies for Online Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Integrated education on medical terminology and pedagogical methods for preservice nurse educators.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three instructional design strategies to promote learner-content interaction in online environments.
Learners design two types of activities for learner-instructor and learner-learner collaboration on a virtual learning platform.
Learners develop one formative assessment tool for evaluating the effectiveness of nursing education in a blended environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
